6 void cloud_cb(const sensor_msgs::PointCloud2ConstPtr& input)
7 {
8  Segmentation::Parameters params;
9  params.zmin = 0.03;
10  params.zmax = 2.0;
11  params.th_points = 200;
12  params.voxel_resolution = 0.0075f;
13  params.seed_resolution = 0.015f;
14  params.color_importance = 0.0f;
15  params.spatial_importance = 1.0f;
16  params.normal_importance = 4.0f;
17  params.use_extended_convexity = false;
18  params.use_sanity_criterion = true;
19  params.concavity_tolerance_threshold = 10;
20  params.smoothness_threshold = 0.1f;
21  params.min_segment_size = 3;
22 
23  pcl::PointCloud<PointT>::Ptr input_cloud_pcl(new pcl::PointCloud<PointT>);
24  pcl::fromROSMsg(*input, *input_cloud_pcl);
25 
26  Segmentation* seg = new Segmentation(input_cloud_pcl, params);
27  seg->segment();
28 
29  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr table_cloud(new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>());
30  seg->getTablecloud(table_cloud);
31  std::cout<<"Size of table cloud: "<<table_cloud->points.size()<<std::endl;
32  sensor_msgs::PointCloud2 table_cloud_ros;
33  pcl::toROSMsg(*table_cloud, table_cloud_ros);
34  table_cloud_ros.header.frame_id = "kinect2_link";
35  table_cloud_ros.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
36  table_pub.publish(table_cloud_ros);
37 
38  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr object_on_table_cloud(new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>());
39  seg->getObjectsOnTable(object_on_table_cloud);
40  std::cout<<"Size of cloud on table: "<<object_on_table_cloud->points.size()<<std::endl;
41  sensor_msgs::PointCloud2 object_cloud_ros;
42  pcl::toROSMsg(*object_on_table_cloud, object_cloud_ros);
43  object_cloud_ros.header.frame_id = "kinect2_link";
44  object_cloud_ros.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
45  object_on_table_pub.publish(object_cloud_ros);
46 
47  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr object_cloud(new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>());
48  seg->getObjectsCloud(object_cloud);
49  std::cout<<"Size of segmented objects cloud: "<<object_cloud->points.size()<<std::endl;
50  sensor_msgs::PointCloud2 objects_cloud_ros;
51  pcl::toROSMsg(*object_cloud, objects_cloud_ros);
52  objects_cloud_ros.header.frame_id = "kinect2_link";
53  objects_cloud_ros.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
54  object_pub.publish(objects_cloud_ros);
55 
56  std::vector<pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr> objects;
57  seg->getObjects(objects);
58  std::cout<<"Detected objects: "<<objects.size()<<std::endl;
59 
60 
61 }

63 int main(int argc, char **argv)
64 {
65  ros::init(argc, argv, "segmentation_test");
66  ros::NodeHandle nh;
67 
68  //after cloud_filter_node is running
69  //ros::Subscriber sub = nh.subscribe("/cloud_filter_node/cloud_filtered",1,cloud_cb);
70  ros::Subscriber sub = nh.subscribe("kinect2/sd/points",1,cloud_cb);
71  table_pub = nh.advertise<sensor_msgs::PointCloud2> ("table_cloud",10);
72  object_on_table_pub = nh.advertise<sensor_msgs::PointCloud2> ("object",10);
